verses.roman:
tomā-saṅge rahe yata sannyāsīra gaṇa
gopīnāthācārya tāṅre kariyāche nimantraṇa

synonyms: tomā-saṅge—along with You; rahe—remain; yata—as many as; sannyāsīra gaṇa—rank of sannyāsīs; gopīnātha-ācārya—Gopīnātha Ācārya; tāṅre—all of them; kariyāche—has done; nimantraṇa—invitation.
translation: "Gopīnātha Ācārya has invited all the sannyāsīs who remained with You to come and take prasāda.
